task.title: Setting Up the Power Supply
task.shortdesc: Describes the process for installing and setting up the power supply for the expansion module.

taskbody.prereq: Remove the Power Supply Door (top right side).

step.cmd: First connect one DC power cord (DIN connector) to the Power connector on the PCB.
Now install the two DC Power Supplies as illustrated.

fig.title: Power Supplies and Future Expansion PCB Locations.

step.cmd: Route the remaining cords out the rear of the case. Be sure the power cords are seated in the door cutouts before replacing the Door.
